application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description:
T3-Oak
Remove major dead and diseased wood.
ALL ITEMS INCLUDING REMOVING ARISING DEBRIS, LEAVING SITE CLEAN AND TIDY.

-	Please see map for location 
-	Tree has large amounts of deadwood with in the crown.

T4-Red Wood
Fell to ground level (tree in decline).
ALL ITEMS INCLUDING REMOVING ARISING DEBRIS, LEAVING SITE CLEAN AND TIDY.

-	Please see map for location.
-	The tree is in decline and showing signs of die back in the upper crown.
-	Its proximity to the parking area is causing anxiety and apprehension to the residents
decision_conditions:
With respect to the proposed work to T3:
The removal of dead wood from a tree protected by a Tree Preservation Order (TPO) is exempt from the requirement for formal consent. However, no live wood shall be cut or removed without the prior written approval of the local planning authority.
